name: Cheatconfession.com
tag_list: stories, posts, comments, anonymous, cheated-on, cheater, thinking-about-cheating, other-person, infidelity, affair, affairs, relationship
overview: Cheatconfession.com is a micro blogging site that allows users to anonymously confess to cheating on somebody, being cheated on, thinking about cheating, or being the “other person”. Users can write letters to the person they wronged or who wronged them. Users are also able to vote whether or not somebody is justified in their actions or can anonymously comment on a story.
